roleset.name: to deprive of the use of some body part by wounding, cripple, injured, hindered via bodily injury
roleset.note: MAIM-V NOTES: Frames file for 'maim' based on dictionary.com Verbnet entry 44. (from maim.01-v predicate notes)
MAIMED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, maim-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls destroy-44. (from maimed.01-j)

roles.note: If an additional instrument arg is needed, please add one in accordance with the verb frame. (from maimed.01-j)

example.name: ARG2
example.text: he ran to a person who had apprehended one of his associates, and maimed him with a knife,

example.name: both args
example.text: Zhang Beiqi Was Maimed from Being Tortured on the "Stretching Bed" in Jilin Prison.
example.arg: from Being Tortured on the "Stretching Bed"
